English: What's the matter?! Get back on your feet!
Chinese:
怎麼啦！？
站起來啊！
Korean:
자아, 어떻게 된 거냐!?
다시 한번 일어나!
German: Was ist denn los?! Aufstehen und weitermachen!

English: Urgh...
Chinese: 嗚嗚……
Korean: 우우…
German: Argh ...

English: I...I'm done.
Chinese: ……不、不行了啦。
Korean: ……이, 이제 무리야
German: Ich ... Ich hab genug.

English: Agumon...Gabumon!
Chinese: 亞古獸……加布獸……！
Korean: 아구몬… 파피몬…!
German: Agumon ... Gabumon!

English:
That's enough! Don't go so hard on them!
Can't you slow things down a little?!
Chinese:
停、該停了吧……！　要特訓的話，
下次再來就好了啊！
也不可能這麼快就變強……！
Korean:
이, 이제 그만하자…! 특훈이라면 다음에 하면 되는걸!
그렇게 갑자기 강해질 리가 없어……!
German:
Das reicht! Nimm sie nicht so hart ran!
Kannst du nicht einen Gang runterschalten?!

English:
Ah, it looks like you're the reason they're so
weak, Nokia.
Chinese:
……看起來，你們弱小的原因就在妳身上呢～
諾奇雅小姐。
Korean:
……아무래도 약한 원인은 당신에게 있는 것 같네요~
노키아 씨
German:
Sieht so aus, als ob du der Grund bist, warum
sie so schwach sind, Nokia.

English: What? Me?
Korean: 어……?  나…에게?
German: Wie? Ich?

English: Yeah, you...
Chinese: 沒錯，妳啊──
Korean: 그 말대로야. 너에겐――
German: Ja, du ...

English: ...don't love them enough!
Chinese: 妳的愛不夠啊！！！！！
Korean: 사랑이 부족해!!!!!
German: ... liebst sie nicht genug!

English: Love?!
Korean: 사, 사랑…!?
German: Nicht genug Liebe?!

English:
You just think of yourself as someone who supports
your Digimon from behind the scenes.
Chinese:
……妳是不是以為，自己只是在
數碼寶貝後面加油的存在？
Korean:
…너, 자기가 디지몬 뒤에서 응원이나 하는
존재라고 생각하고 있는 거야?
German:
Du unterstützt Digimon gern von hinter den
Kulissen aus.

English:
You see the Digimon as the stars and yourself as
nothing more than a bit player.
Chinese: 是不是以為主角是數碼寶貝，自己只是附帶的呢？
Korean:
주역은 어디까지나 디지몬이고 자기는 곁다리라고 
생각하는 거 아니야?
German:
Für dich sind die Digimon die Stars und du nur
eine Komparsin.

English: But supporting them is all I can do...
Chinese:
但、但是，我能做的也只有
加油跟輔助大家而已──
Korean:
하, 하지만 내가 할 수 있는 건 응원하거나
모두를 서포트하는 정도고――
German: Mehr als sie unterstützen kann ich nicht tun ...

English: You couldn't be more wrong!
Chinese: 那妳就大錯特錯了！
Korean: 그건 크나큰 착각이야!
German: Da liegst du völlig falsch!

English:
We Digimon are life forms that Digivolve by
assimilating information from our environment!
Chinese:
我們可是吸收周遭資訊來進化的生命──
數碼寶貝啊！
Korean:
우리들은 주위의 정보를 흡수해 진화하는 생명체――
디지털 몬스터!
German:
Wir Digimon sind Lebensformen, die digitieren,
indem wir Informationen aus unserer
Umgebung assimilieren!

English:
To us, the most important thing is the love of a
partner who believes in us. Love!
Chinese:
對我們來說，最能成為力量的──
那就是相信我們搭檔的愛……
愛啊！
Korean:
우리들에게 있어 가장 힘이 되는 것―― 그건
우리들을 믿어주는 파트너의 사랑…… 사랑이라구!
German:
Für uns ist die Liebe eines Partners, der an uns
glaubt, das Allerwichtigste. Liebe!

English: Love is the most important thing?
Chinese: 愛能…………變成力量？
Korean: 사랑이… 힘으로?
German: Liebe ist das Wichtigste?

English:
Love from those around us makes us stronger, more
than anything else.
Chinese: 來自我們身邊的人的愛，最能讓我們變強！
Korean: 곁에 있는 사람들의 사랑이 무엇보다도 우리를 강하게 해줘
German:
Liebe von den Leuten, die uns nahestehen,
macht uns stärker als alles andere.

English: For us, it's Gankoomon and Hackmon.
Chinese: 以我們來說，就是師父的頑固獸和哈克獸──
Korean: 우리들에게는 스승인 간쿠몬이나 헉몬――
German: Für uns sind das Gankoomon und Hackmon.

English:
Gankoomon's boundless love and Hackmon's deeply
sincere love.
Chinese:
頑固獸那像大海一般的愛，
以及哈克獸那直率的愛。
Korean:
간쿠몬 님의 바다와 같은 큰 사랑이나
헉몬의 한결같은 사랑
German:
Gankoomons grenzenlose Liebe und Hackmons tiefe,
aufrichtige Liebe.

English:
It made us stronger. It made us into who we are
today.
Chinese:
那些愛是讓我們變強最重要的原因……
也才有現在的我們喔。
Korean:
그것이 우리들을 무엇보다 강하게 해줬어…
그래서 지금의 우리가 있는 거야
German:
Sie hat uns stärker gemacht. Sie hat uns zu dem
gemacht, was wir heute sind.

English: Do you have such love in you, Nokia Shiramine?!
Chinese: 那種愛……妳有嗎！？　……白峰諾奇雅！！
Korean: 그런 사랑이… 너에게 있는 거야!? …시라미네 노키아!!
German: Bist du zu solcher Liebe fähig, Nokia Shiramine?!

English:
I...I...don't really know how to answer that...
What is love?
Chinese:
突、突然這麼說……我也不知道啊……
愛到底是什麼啊……？
Korean:
가, 갑자기 물어봤자…… 잘 모르겠어…….
사랑이란 뭘까…?
German:
Ich ... Ich ... weiß wirklich nicht, wie ich das
beantworten soll ... Was ist Liebe?

English:
I really like Agumon and Gabumon. Isn't that
enough?
Chinese:
我雖然最喜歡亞古獸和加布獸……
但只有這樣，是不行的嗎……！？
Korean:
아구몬과 파피몬을 정말 좋아하지만….
그것만으론 안되는 거야…!?
German:
Ich mag Agumon und Gabumon wirklich.
Ist das nicht genug?

English: How can I be like that?
Chinese: 要怎麼做才會有那種愛呢……！？
Korean: 어떻게 해야 그걸 가질 수 있지…!?
German: Warum bin ich so?

English:
You have to figure it out for yourself.
We're Digimon, not humans.
Chinese:
誰知道呢，妳就自己想想吧。
我們是數碼寶貝，可不是人啊。
Korean:
글쎄, 그건 스스로 생각해.
우리들은 디지몬. 인간이 아니니까
German:
Das musst du selbst herausfinden.
Wir sind Digimon und keine Menschen.

English: Erm...
Chinese: 嗚嗚……
Korean: 우우……
German: Ähm ...

English: And what do you think, as a human?
Chinese:
是啊～
……同樣身為人類，你是怎麼想的呢？
Korean:
그렇죠~
…당신은 어떻게 생각하나요? 같은 인간 입장에서
German: Und was meinst du, als Mensch?

English: (Love is...)
Korean: (사랑이란……)
German: (Liebe ist ...)

English:
Something you show!
...Something you give.
Chinese:
灌輸！
……給予
Korean:
부딪치는…것!
……주는 거야
German:
Etwas, was man zeigt!
... Etwas, was man gibt.

English: Something you...show!
Chinese: 灌輸……！
Korean: 부딪치는… 것!
German: Etwas, was man ... zeigt!

English: Wow, not a bad answer!
Chinese: 喔……說得真好啊！
Korean: 헤에…… 제법 괜찮은 말을 하는걸!
German: Wow, das ist keine schlechte Antwort!

English: Something you...give.
Chinese: 給予……
Korean: 주는…것
German: Etwas, was man ... gibt.

English: Yeah, I like the sound of that!
Chinese: 我、我也覺得很棒喔～
Korean: 와아, 저도 그건 멋진 것 같아요~
German: Ja, das klingt gut!

English: Right! I get it now! It's just like you said!
Chinese:
…………這樣啊。嗯！　我知道了！！
就跟大家說的一樣……！！
Korean:
…………그렇구나. 응! 알겠어!!
모두가 말하는 대로야…!!
German:
Ach so! Jetzt verstehe ich! Es ist, wie du
gesagt hast!

English:
Agumon, Gabumon, I'm so sorry! It looks like I'm
the one who was wrong!
Chinese:
亞古獸、加布獸，對不起喔！
弄錯狀況的──好像是我喔！
Korean:
아구몬, 파피몬, 미안해!
틀린 건―― 나였던 것 같아!
German:
Agumon, Gabumon, es tut mir so leid!
Anscheinend lag der Fehler bei mir!

English: Nokia?
Chinese: 諾奇雅……？
Korean: 노키아…?
German: Nokia?

English: Catch my love!
Chinese: 接下─────我的愛吧！！！！
Korean: 나의 사랑을――――― 받아줘!!!!
German: Spürt meine Liebe!

English: Mwwwwah!
German: *Knutsch*!

English: Was that kiss...
Chinese: 剛才的飛吻是……
Korean: 지금 날린 키스가……
German: War dieser Kuss ...

English: ...love?
Korean: 사랑…?
German: ... Liebe?

English: Yeah! It was my love!
Chinese: 嗯！！　這就是我的風格的愛！
Korean: 응!!!  이게 내 나름의 사랑!
German: Ja, das war meine Liebe!

English:
To be honest, I don't really know what love is.
But that masked man taught me one thing...
Chinese:
……說實話，我根本不清楚什麼是愛！
但是，面具男說的讓我明白了一件事──
Korean:
…솔직히 사랑이란 게 뭔지는 잘 모르겠어!
하지만 가면남의 말을 듣고 한가지 깨달은 건――
German:
Um ehrlich zu sein, weiß ich nicht wirklich, was
Liebe ist. Aber der maskierte Kerl hat
mich eins gelehrt ...

English: Love is something you show through your actions!
Chinese: 愛要用行動來表示！！！
Korean: 사랑은 행동으로 드러내야 한다는 것!!!
German: Liebe ist etwas, was man mit seinen Taten zeigt!

English:
It's not enough to just think it or say it!
Love is meaningless if you don't express it!
Chinese:
只用想的、只用說的都不行！
愛要是不好好傳達出去就沒有意義了！
Korean:
생각만으론 안 돼, 말로 하는 것만으로는 안 돼!
사랑을 제대로 전하지 않으면 의미가 없다는 거야!
German:
Es ist nicht genug, etwas nur zu denken oder zu
sagen! Liebe ist bedeutungslos, wenn man sie
nicht auslebt!

English: So I demonstrated this small step with my actions!
Chinese: 所以我，要把這小小的一步化為行動表示出來！
Korean: 그러니 나는 이 작은 한 걸음을 행동으로 옮기겠어!
German: Deswegen musste diese kleine Liebesbekundung sein!

English: That's my love.
Chinese: 這就是我的愛──
Korean: 그것이 나의 사랑――
German: Das ist meine Liebe.

English: Yeah... That's how I show my love for my Digimon!
Chinese:
不對……用我的話來說，就是我對
數碼寶貝的“LOVE”啊啊啊啊啊──────！！
Korean:
으응……내 식으로 말하자면 그것이 나의
디지몬에 대한 "러브♥" 다아아아아아――――――!!
German: Ja ... So zeige ich meine Liebe für meine Digimon!

English: Nokia...
Chinese: 諾奇雅……
Korean: 노키아……
German: Nokia ...

English:
Okay, look alive! Our training is just getting
started!
Chinese:
來吧，打起精神戰鬥吧♪
我們的特訓現在才要開始喔！
Korean:
자아, 힘내서 가자♪
우리들의 특훈은 이제부터 시작이야!
German:
Los jetzt! Unser Training hat gerade erst
angefangen!

English:
No matter how many times you fail, I'll be right
here...sending you my love!
Chinese:
不管輸了幾次，不管被打擊幾次都沒關係！
我會在你們身邊……一直將愛送給你們喔！
Korean:
몇 번을 지더라도, 몇 번을 좌절하더라도 괜찮아!
내가 곁에서…… 너희들에게 러브를 계속 보낼 테니까!
German:
Egal, wie oft ihr etwas nicht schafft, ich werde
hier sein ... und euch meine Liebe schenken!

English:
Wow... I don't really understand what you mean,
but...
Chinese:
……嘻嘻，雖然總是搞不懂諾奇雅說的話，
但是──
Korean:
……에헤헤. 노키아가 하는 말은 항상 하나도 모르겠어.
하지만――
German:
Wow ... Ich weiß nicht genau, was du meinst,
aber ...

English: Your love makes me feel all warm and fuzzy!
Chinese: 諾奇雅的LOVE，感覺好溫暖喔！
Korean: 노키아의 러브, 따뜻하네!
German: Dank deiner Liebe wird mir ganz warm ums Herz!

English:
Yeah! I feel all warm inside too! It's like...I'm
full of power!
Chinese:
嗯！　心都暖洋洋的！
我……好像有力量跑出來了……！
Korean:
응! 마음이 포근해져!
나… 힘이 솟아나는 것 같아…!
German:
Ja! Mir ist auch ganz warm! Als ob ich ganz viel
Macht habe!

English: Me too! I feel stronger already!
Chinese:
我也是！
現在的話──感覺能變得更強！！
Korean:
나도 그래!
지금이라면 분명―― 강해질 듯한 기분이 들어!!
German: Ich auch! Ich fühle mich schon stärker!

English: Whooooaaaa!
Chinese: 嗚哦哦哦哦哦哦哦──────！！
Korean: 우오오오오오오오오오오오―――――――!!
German: Boooaaahhh!

English: Agumon Digivolution!
German: Digitation von Agumon!

English: Greymon!
Chinese: 暴龍獸！
Korean: 그레이몬!
German: Greymon!

English: Gabumon Digivolution!
German: Digitation von Gabumon!

English: Garurumon!
Chinese: 加魯魯獸！
Korean: 가루몬!
German: Garurumon!

English: Greymon? Garurumon? What's going on?!
Chinese:
暴龍獸……？　加魯魯獸……？
這、這什麼啊！？
Korean:
그레이몬……?  가루몬……?
뭐, 뭐야 이건!?
German: Greymon? Garurumon? Was ist hier los?!

English:
It's Digivolution! Proof that your Digimon are
developing!
Chinese: 這就是數碼寶貝成長的證明……進化！
Korean: 이것이 디지몬의 성장의 증거…… 진화야!
German:
Das ist ihre Digitation! Ein Beweis, dass deine
Digimon sich weiterentwickeln!

English: It proves that your love has reached them!
Chinese:
諾奇雅小姐的愛……不對，
是LOVE傳達給兩位了呢～
Korean: 노키아의 사랑… 아니, 러브가 둘에게 전해진 증거예요~!
German:
Es beweist, dass deine Liebe bei ihnen angekommen
ist!

English: That's Digivolution?! This is so amazing!
Chinese:
這就是……數碼寶貝的進化……！
好厲害、好厲害、好厲害喔！
Korean:
이것이… 디지몬의 진화……!
굉장해, 굉장해, 굉장해!!
German: Das ist Digitation?! Das ist ja fantastisch!

English: Wow! It's true! I've Digivolved!
Chinese: 真的耶……我，成功進化了！
Korean: 정말이다…… 나, 진화했어!
German: Wow! Es ist wahr! Ich bin digitiert!

English: Now we can fight again!
Chinese: 這樣我們就能再次戰鬥了喔，諾奇雅！
Korean: 이거라면 우리들, 다시 한번 싸울 수 있어, 노키아!
German: Jetzt können wir wieder kämpfen!

English:
I never knew you could show love like that.
Humans really are strange creatures, but it works!
Chinese:
居然有這種傳達愛的方法，人類真是奇妙呢。
……不過，很不錯喔！
Korean:
이렇게 사랑을 전하다니 인간이란 정말 신기해.
…하지만 나쁘진 않은데!
German:
Ich wusste gar nicht, dass man so Liebe zeigen
kann. Menschen sind seltsame Kreaturen, aber
es funktioniert!

English: This time, let's not hold back, Blanc!
Chinese: 那就換我們使出全力吧，雪白！
Korean: 다음엔 우리도 진심으로 가자, 블랑!
German: Dieses Mal halten wir uns nicht zurück, Blanc!

English: Okay.
Chinese: 好～的。
Korean: 네~
German: Okay.

English: And you support Nokia.
Chinese: 那麼，就拜託你去輔助諾奇雅小姐他們吧～
Korean:
그러면 당신은 노키아 씨를
서포트해주세요~
German: Und ihr unterstützt Nokia.

English:
They'll be no match for what's about to come next.
Watch...
Chinese:
要是你待在這，可是跟不上我們的喔，
因為──
Korean:
이쪽에 있어도 당신은 따라올 수 없어.
왜냐면――
German:
Sie können nicht mithalten gegen das, was als
Nächstes kommt. Schau ...

English: Did you Digivolve, too?!
Chinese: 修女獸姊妹也……進化了！？
Korean: 시스터몬 자매도… 진화했다!?
German: Seid ihr auch digitiert?!

English:
This is something we learned to do through years
of training.
Chinese: 這就是，我們經歷漫長修行後，所得到的姿態……
Korean: 이것이 오랜 수행을 거친 우리들이 자아낸 강함의 형태…
German: Das haben wir durch jahrelanges Training gelernt.

English:
We won't hold back this time!
Whooooaaaa!
Chinese:
我們要從現在……拿出真本事喔！
呵呵……呵哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈……！
Korean:
우리들이 진심으로 나서는건… 지금부터예요!
우후…우후후후후후후후후후후후후후후…!
German:
Dieses Mal halten wir uns nicht zurück!
Boooaaahhh!

English: You gonna show us just how strong you are now?!
Chinese: 你們到底能讓我們看到多少實力呢……！？
Korean:
당신들은 대체 어떤 강함을 저희들에게
보여줄까요…!?
German: Zeigt ihr uns, wie stark ihr jetzt seid?!

English: Bring it on! Let's see what you're made of!
Chinese:
來吧！　來吧！　來吧！！！　快點讓我！
讓我們修女獸姊妹們見識看看吧！
Korean:
자아! 자아!! 자아!!!  빨리 저에게!
이 시스터몬 자매에게 그 모습을 보여주세요!
German: Na los! Zeigt uns, was ihr draufhabt!

English:
Argh! She doesn't just look different, she's even
acting different?!
Chinese: 噫、噫噫……不只是樣貌，連個性都變了啊！？
Korean: 히, 히에에… 형태만이 아니라 성격까지 변해버렸네!?
German:
Argh! Sie sieht nicht nur anders aus, sie
verhält sich auch anders?!

English:
The strong fighting spirit we feel from you has
awakened my little sister's killer instinct.
Chinese:
妹妹她感受到，你們身上滿溢而出的鬥志，
讓她的本能歡喜到發抖了啊……
Korean:
너희들에게서 느껴지는 넘치는 투기가
동생의 본능을 기쁨으로 떨게 만드는 거야…
German:
Der starke Kampfgeist, den wir in euch spüren,
hat den Killerinstinkt meiner kleinen Schwester
geweckt.

English: Mine too, of course. Hehehe...
Chinese: 當然，我也是喔……呵呵……
Korean: 물론 나도…말이지. 후후…
German: Und meinen natürlich auch. Hehehe ...

English:
You mean you were holding back before?!
I'm not sure about this, but...
Chinese:
所以剛才的都不是認真的囉……？
嗚嗚……好可怕……雖然可怕──
Korean:
방금 전엔 진심이 아니었단 말이야…?
우우… 무서워~ …무섭지만――
German:
Das heißt, dass ihr euch vorhin zurückgehalten
habt?! Ich weiß ja nicht, aber ...

English: We're nothing like we were before!
Chinese: 但是！！　我也跟先前不一樣了喔！！
Korean: 그래도!!  우리들 역시 방금 전과는 다르다구!!
German: Wir sind ganz anders als vorher!

English:
Help us out, masked man! I'll show you that the
power of our love is real!
Chinese:
面具男，來幫我吧！
現在就讓她們看看，我的LOVE力量是不是真的！
Korean:
가면남, 힘을 빌려줘!
우리들의 러브파워가 진짜라는 증거를 지금이야말로 보여줄 테니까!
German:
Hilf uns, maskierter Mann! Ich zeige dir, dass
die Macht unserer Liebe echt ist!

English: Here goes! Both of you! Here comes my love power!
Chinese:
要上了喔！　你們兩個！
LOVE力量！　全力注入──────！！！
Korean:
가자! 모두들!
러브♥파워!  전력 주입이다아―――――――!!
German:
Los geht’s! Ihr beide! Hier kommt die Macht meiner
Liebe!

English: Yeah!
Chinese: 喔！
Korean: 응!
German: Jawohl!

English:
Hehehe! That's what I like to see!
I'm sure we'll be worthy opponents!
Chinese:
呵呵、呵呵呵！　很好……太好了！
這股氣勢……你們有資格當我的對手！
Korean:
후후, 후후후!  좋지… 좋아!
그 기백… 상대로 부족함이 없어!
German:
Hehehe! So was sehe ich gern!
Wir werden sicher würdige Gegner sein!

English: Behold the power of the awakened Sistermon!
Chinese:
覺醒後的修女獸姊妹之力……
你們就好好見識一下吧！！
Korean: 각성한 시스터몬 자매의 힘…… 똑똑히 보도록!!
German: Seht da, die Macht der erwachten Sistermon!
